headline: Assessing J. M. Smucker’s (SJM) Valuation After a Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: J. M. Smucker (SJM) has quietly lagged the market this year, with the stock slipping about 10% year to date and roughly 8% over the past month, despite steady revenue growth. See our latest analysis for J. M. Smucker. At around $99.68 per share, the recent 1 month share price return of negative 8.15 percent extends a weaker trend. The 3 year total shareholder return of negative 27.91 percent suggests momentum has been fading rather than building. If SJM’s recent slip has you rethinking your...

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell SJM and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: J. M. Smucker has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small return of 3.7% while holding steady at $99.40. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 13.6% gain during that period.
